\begin{center}
\begin{tikzcd}
\mathcal{P}_0 \arrow[r, "\Lambda_0", shift left] \arrow[d, "\iota_{P}"'] & \mathcal{B}_0 \arrow[l, "\Gamma_0", shift left] \arrow[d, "\iota_{B}"] \\
\mathcal{P} \arrow[r, "\Lambda", shift left]                             & B \arrow[l, "\Gamma", shift left]                                     
\end{tikzcd}
\end{center}
